original_title: Sooriyawewa Pradeshiya Sabha secretary arrested for soliciting Rs.50,000 bribe
original_body_lines: The Sooriyawewa Pradeshiya Sabha secretary has been arrested by Bribery Commission (BC) officials while soliciting a bribe of Rs.50,000 at the Pradeshiya Sabha.
Director (Investigations) of the Bribery Commission SSP Nuwan Asanka said he was arrested following a complaint by an individual from Ambalantota.
The arrested suspect will be produced before the Hambantota Magistrate's Court today.(Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
